net.kyori.event.method

Class SimpleMethodSubscriptionAdapter<E,L>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kyori.event.method.SimpleMethodSubscriptionAdapter<E,L>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the event type
    L - the listener type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    MethodSubscriptionAdapter<L>

    public class SimpleMethodSubscriptionAdapter<E,L>
extends java.lang.Object
implements MethodSubscriptionAdapter<L>
    A simple implementation of a method subscription adapter.
